page.title: 16Employment
page.content: There are a lot of unemployed people in Annan. Many people have jobs. A lot of people work at the { {Chapelcross Nuclear Power Station}to the north of the town. It was built in the late 1950's. There is also a boiler works at{Newbie}called{Cochrans and an{I.C.I}factory which makes explosives. A crane factory called{ {Boyds}closed earlier this year. Many women work at two fish factories called {Scottish Sea Foods}and{Pinneys {Smokehouses.} { }In our part of our Annan there is only one industrial area. The biggest factory is called{Cheshire Cat,}who make casual clothes. There is also a garage, an agricultural merchants depot and a motor repair works.
